snippet: The Texas governor met with Luca di Montezemolo, chairman of the Italian supercar manufacturer, and drove the company's vehicles during his visit to Italy.
abstract: The Texas governor met with Luca di Montezemolo, chairman of the Italian supercar manufacturer, and drove the company's vehicles during his visit to Italy.

headline.main: Gov. Rick Perry, in the Hot Seat at Ferrari Headquarters
headline.print_headline: The Blog: Gov. Rick Perry, in the Hot Seat at Ferrari
